definitions.text:
Cloke
1. A loose outer garment worn over other clothes both by men and women.He was clad with zeal as a cloke Isaiah 59:17.
2. A cover; that which conceals; a disguise or pretext; an excuse; a fair pretense.Not using your liberty for a cloke of maliciousness. 1 Peter 2:16.They have no cloke for their sin. John 15:22.CLOKE,

1. To cover with a cloke
2. To hide; to conceal; to use a false covering.
